title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Improving English Teachers’ Awareness of Teaching and Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can diagnose their teaching styles using Peacock’s Teaching Style Questionnaire and Reid’s Learning Style Theory.
Participants can analyze the relationship between learning styles and teaching styles and propose ways to apply Doyle and Rutherford’s congruent instructional design to actual classes.

The participant explains the core principles of mixed research methods using triangulation (survey/interview/observation), designs three data collection tools (10-question survey, 5-question interview guide, 3-item observation checklist) for their classroom environment, and performs a simple analysis process (coding/categorization) based on hypothetical collected data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
